data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Excuse me. My ____ is ____ working ____ now. I ____ not ____ what ____ it ____. Can ____ tell ____ the ____? I ____ a ____ at ____ past ____ at a business ____ here. I cannot be late for the meeting.
data.partBlankContent: Excuse me. My cl___ is n__ working ri___ now. I d_ not kn__ what ti__ it i_. Can y__ tell m_ the ti__? I ha__ a mee____ at ha__ past o__ at a business ne__ here. I cannot be late for the meeting.
data.fullContent: Excuse me. My clock is not working right now. I do not know what time it is. Can you tell me the time? I have a meeting at half past one at a business near here. I cannot be late for the meeting.
data.answer: 不好意思。我的钟现在不走了。我不知道现在几点了。你能告诉我时间吗?我一点半在附近一家公司开会。我开会不能迟到。
